I don't see you on Nvidia's CCLA. 
1. Can one of your CCLA managers add you to the CCLA? 
2. Then can your admin add you to the Gerrit CI approved list so you don't get a "User not approved, see admin, no CI"

Thanks Gunnar, I will check to resolve. BTW, can someone help check if the change style ok? Mainly the name definition for IPv6 values and methods, and the methods changing to support both IPv4 and IPv6. Thanks.
Done

I see there are lint errors when downloaded the patch in my local.Please fix them
Networkstore
ModalDefaultGateway
ModalIpv6
Network
Tableipv6 vue files.
Done
There are runtime errors on initial load or refresh of Network page: "Property or method "ipv6DefaultGateway" is not defined on the instance but referenced during render".
Done
On toggle of DHCP, getting: "Successfully updated pageNetwork.dhcp6 settings."
Done

Can you add a bit more here? What fields? E.g. 
          DHCPv6,
          IPv6Addresses,
          IPv6StaticAddresses,
          IPv6DefaultGateway,

All of these fields are in bmcweb I believe ?
Yes, all these fields supported in bmcweb, add them in the updated commit message.
Any testing? Can you add a testing statement? E.g. Tested: See an IPv6 ethernet interface, IPv4 interfaces look the same?
Yes, added the tested functions in the commit message.
Hi, @Gunnar @Ed, could you help review the patch. Thanks.
Rebased to the latest master, and some mininor change after rebase, please help review. Thanks.
Please merge when you are ready. Just hit the "Submit" button.
Done
